commands.name: az iot hub distributed-tracing show
commands.summary: Get the distributed tracing settings for a device.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub distributed-tracing show --device-id
                                    --hub-name
                                    [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                    [--resource-group]

commands.name: az iot hub distributed-tracing update
commands.summary: Update the distributed tracing options for a device.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub distributed-tracing update --device-id
                                      --hub-name
                                      --sampling-mode {off, on}
                                      --sampling-rate
                                      [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                      [--resource-group]
examples: az iot hub distributed-tracing update -d {device_id} --sm on --sr 50 -n {iothub_name}
